1_adsense_account.title: Create AdSense Account
steps: Sign up with your Google account
Choose how you want to be paid

2_site_verification.title: Verify Your Site
steps: Add AdSense code to your site's <head> section
Wait for Google to review your site (can take 24-48 hours)
Ensure your site has quality content and follows AdSense policies

4_implementation.title: Implementation Steps
steps: Replace 'YOUR_PUBLISHER_ID' with your actual publisher ID
Replace ad slot IDs with your actual slot IDs

ads_not_showing: Check if ad blocker is enabled
Verify publisher ID and slot IDs are correct
Ensure site is approved by AdSense
low_revenue: Monitor ad frequency to avoid fatigue
policy_violations: Don't encourage users to click ads

pwa_specific_considerations.service_worker: Ensure ads work with service worker caching
pwa_specific_considerations.offline_mode: Handle ad failures gracefully when offline
pwa_specific_considerations.app_install: Ads should work in installed PWA mode
pwa_specific_considerations.performance: Monitor ad impact on PWA performance scores
